nl.tudelft.dnainator.graph.impl

Class Neo4jGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tudelft.dnainator.graph.impl.Neo4jGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph

    public final class Neo4jGraph
extends Object
implements Graph
    This class realizes a graphfactory using Neo4j as it's backend.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Neo4jGraph(AnnotationCollectionFactory fact, String path)
      Constructs a Neo4j database on the specified path.
      Neo4jGraph(String path)
      Constructs a Neo4j database on the specified path, using the default annotation collection factory (AnnotationCollectionFactory).

        protected org.neo4j.graphdb.ResourceIterator<org.neo4j.graphdb.Node> rootIterator()

        Returns:
        a resource iterator
